bug.short_desc: Enlightenment mixer is missing Pulseaudio support
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Enlightenment sound mixer does not change volumes, nor does show available outputs.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): enlightenment-0.21.2-1.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Grep for errors: 2. Open mixer widget, check Outputs tab.
Actual results: Errors in .xsession-errors: grep emix ~/.xsession-errors CRI<2418>:emix src/modules/mixer/lib/emix.c:197 emix_backend_set() Requested backend not found (PULSEAUDIO) CRI<12227>:emix src/modules/mixer/lib/emix.c:197 emix_backend_set() Requested backend not found (PULSEAUDIO) ERR<12227>: src/modules/mixer/lib/emix.c:291 emix_sink_inputs_get() safety check failed: (ctx && ctx->loaded && ctx->loaded->ebackend_sink_inputs_get) is false
Expected results: 1. No errors in .xsession-errors file 2. Outputs list like "Headphone", "Line out"
Additional info: Adding BuildRequires: pulseaudio-libs-devel to enlightenment.spec file and rebuild of package solve this problem.
